description: Unpredictable alpine environments demand clothing with performance and protection that carries you from trail to camp. The Covert Hoody’s iconic Arc’teryx design – clean, efficient, effective – creates a warming layer that works all day and performs under a shell or on its own. The warm, soft Alpenex II™ heathered fleece is made from 100% recycled polyester. Gusseted underarms provide freedom of movement, laminated pockets keep essentials at hand, and the low-profile fitted hood extends the warmth.
name: Arcteryx Covert Hoody - Mens
